h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: Return to the Shrine, and this time head directly right through a narrow alley into a large open courtyard area. Several Daoists wait for you here, as well as a Spider Puppet in the tree above.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Petalfall Hamlet'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the Shrine, and this time head directly right through a narrow alley into a large open courtyard area. Several Daoists wait for you here, as well as a Spider Puppet in the tree above.
